CTA.WinWithOriginalTeam: Pemain Bisa Menang Bersama Tim Asal
CTA.OriginalWinCondition: Non-Teamed Original Win Condition Triggers a Team-Wide Win
CTA.MaxPlayersAssignedToTeam: Maximum number of players assigned to this team
ScientistEHRInfo: Akses data vital portabel dari mana saja
ShapeshifterEHRInfo: Berubah wujud dalam rangka mengelabui pemain
NoisemakerEHRInfo: Sampaikan kabar kematianmu kepada rekan Crewmate yang lain
WarlockInfo: Curse crewmates & shift to make them kill
NinjaInfo: Mark a target, then shift to kill them
ZombieInfo: You're very slow, but can't be ejected
AnonymousInfo: Force a player to report a body
MinerInfo: Shapeshift untuk berpindah ke ventilasi yang terakhir kali dimasuki
KillingMachineInfo: You can ONLY kill, but low cooldown and bypass shields
EscapistInfo: Shift to mark places and warp back to them
WitchInfo: Spell crewmates to kill them in meetings
SniperInfo: Snipe players from a distance by shifting
ArroganceInfo: Your cooldown decreases with each kill you make
EvilGuesserInfo: Guess roles in meetings to kill
CleanerInfo: Report mayat agar tidak bisa dilaporkan
CursedWolfInfo: Kamu akan selamat dari beberapa percobaan pembunuhan
SoulCatcherInfo: You swap places with your shift target
QuickShooterInfo: Store ammo to offset kill cooldown
EvilEraserInfo: Erase the role of your vote target
SwooperInfo: Manfaatkan ventilasi untuk mode tak kasat mata
WildlingInfo: Bunuh pemain, dan kamu akan kebal sementara
TricksterInfo: Habisi Crewmate dengan berpura-pura menjadi bagian dari tim
VindicatorInfo: Manfaatkan keunggulan suaramu untuk menyingkirkan pemain lain
ParasiteInfo: Help the Impostors kill the crew
DisperserInfo: Teleportasi semua pemain ke ventilasi random
InhibitorInfo: Kamu tidak dapat membunuh saat ada sabotase krisis
SaboteurInfo: Kill to call and stack sabotages. You can only kill during a sabotage
DevourerInfo: Ubah wujud pemain lain melalui Shapeshift
ConsigliereInfo: Discover the roles of other players
MorphlingInfo: Hanya bisa membunuh dalam mode Shapeshift
LurkerInfo: Masuk ventilasi untuk mendapat pengurangan durasi rehat serangan
ConvictInfo: Targetmu mati. Kini kamu membantu Impostor
VisionaryInfo: Kamu bisa melihat basis tim pemain yang masih hidup
RenegadeInfo: Help the Impostors kill off the crew
UnderdogInfo: Start killing on a low player count
DemolitionistInfo: Pelaku pembunuhanmu wajib masuk ventilasi dalam hitungan detik
TaskManagerInfo: See the total tasks completed in real-time
NiceEraserInfo: Hapus peran dari pemain yang kamu vote
ParanoidInfo: You have a portable meeting button
PsychicInfo: One of the red names is <color=#ff1919>evil</color>
MarshallInfo: Rampungkan misi sebagai bukti nyata kalau kamu aman
ForensicInfo: Gain extra info from your body reports
UndercoverInfo: Impostors see you as their partner
NiceGuesserInfo: Guess <color=#ff1919>evil</color> roles in meetings to kill
TransporterInfo: Do tasks to swap 2 players' locations
TimeManagerInfo: Increase meeting time by doing tasks
VeteranInfo: Aktifkan mode siaga untuk hindari serangan
LighterInfo: Catch killers with your enhanced vision
MorticianInfo: Report a body to know who interacted with them last
MonarchInfo: Give your crew extra voting power!
DeputyInfo: Handcuff killers to increase their cooldowns
AddictInfo: Vent to become invulnerable, or you'll die
OracleInfo: Vote a player to see their alignment
SpiritualistInfo: You see where a ghost is
ChameleonInfo: Vent to disguise into your surroundings
InspectorInfo: Validate the alignments of two players
JesterInfo: Cari cara agar terbuang saat rapat
InnocentInfo: Menangkan permainan dengan menjebak pemain lain
WorkaholicInfo: Finish all tasks to solo win!
ProvocateurInfo: Kamu akan menang jika targetmu kalah
BloodKnightInfo: Bunuh pemain, dan kamu akan kebal sementara
PlagueBearerInfo: Sebarkan wabah kepada semua pemain dan menjadi <color=#343136>Pestilence</color>
FollowerInfo: Follow a player and help them
HexMasterInfo: Hex players to kill them in meetings
WraithInfo: Menjadi tak kasat mata melalui ventilasi
JuggernautInfo: Durasi rehat seranganmu berkurang di setiap membunuh
PursuerInfo: Jaga diri dan bertahanlah hingga akhir!
CursedSoulInfo: Snatch souls and steal the win
RitualistInfo: Bunuh dan ungkap peran pemain lain
VultureInfo: Report dan makanlah mayat untuk menang
MasochistInfo: Get attacked a few times to win!
DoomsayerInfo: Tebak peran pemain dengan benar supaya menang
NtrInfo: Everyone sees you as their Lover
TruantInfo: Kamu diam di tempat setelah rapat untuk beberapa saat
WorkhorseInfo: Be the first to complete all tasks and get more
AvengerInfo: You take someone with you upon death
HasteInfo: Your kill cooldown progresses while in vents
GuesserInfo: Guess roles of players in meetings to kill
NecroviewInfo: See the team of the dead
ReachInfo: You have a longer kill range
CharmedInfo: You've been Charmed by the Cultist
ContagiousInfo: You've been Infected by the Virus
BeartrapInfo: Freeze your killer for a few seconds
KnightedInfo: You have an extra vote (from the Monarch)
SleuthInfo: Know the roles of the bodies you report
TaskcounterInfo: You see the total tasks completed in real-time
StainedInfo: Your killer gets a violet name for 3s
DoubleShotInfo: You have an extra life when guessing
RascalInfo: You appear evil in some cases
GravestoneInfo: Your role is revealed when you die
SonarInfo: You have an arrow pointing to the nearest player
SwiftInfo: Your kills don't cause a lunge
UnluckyInfo: Everything has a chance to kill you
BardInfo: Poem's grace, murder's trace, a rhythmic dance in a dark embrace.
EngineerEHRInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nSelaku Engineer, kamu dapat mengakses ventilasi, terkecuali pada saat sabotase komunikasi sedang aktif.
ScientistEHRInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nSelaku Scientist, kamu dilengkapi dengan akses ke perangkat monitor vital portabel yang berfungsi untuk memantau kondisi hidup atau mati pemain lain, terkhusus rekan Crewmate.
ShapeshifterEHRInfoLong: (Impostors):\nSelaku Shapeshifter, kamu dapat berubah wujud menjadi pemain lain untuk mengelabui Crewmate. Berhati-hati saja, karena proses perubahan wujud tersebut disertai dengan efek visual berupa penetasan telur, dan durasi penyamaranmu juga terbatas oleh waktu.
GuardianAngelEHRInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Guardian Angel, you spawn as a ghost and must do your job by protecting crewmates from the Impostors.
ImpostorEHRInfoLong: (Impostors):\nSelaku Impostor, tugasmu hanyalah memburu dan membunuh para Crewmate. Kamu juga bisa melakukan sabotase dan memanfaatkan ventilasi.
CrewmateEHRInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Crewmate, tugas utamamu hanyalah menyelesaikan semua misi, atau mengidentifikasi dan mengeliminasi seluruh Impostor yang ada.
NoisemakerEHRInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nSelaku Noisemaker, jika kamu terbunuh oleh Impostor, sebuah alarm sinyal akan berbunyi, disertai dengan indikator visual kematian sebagai petunjuk agar rekan Crewmate yang lain bisa segera menuju ke TKP.
TrackerEHRInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nSelaku Tracker, kamu dapat melacak pergerakan dari pemain yang ditargetkan. Posisi pemain tersebut akan terlihat di peta pribadi.
PhantomEHRInfoLong: (Impostors):\nSelaku Phantom, kamu dapat menjadi tak kasat mata untuk sementara waktu. Namun, ada efek visual berupa asap sewarna kulitmu, yang muncul sebelum dan sesudah proses tersebut.
BountyHunterInfoLong:
(Impostor):
Selaku Bounty Hunter, kamu harus membunuh target yang ditentukan oleh sistem agar durasi rehat seranganmu bisa berkurang, dan begitupun sebaliknya.

Target akan berganti dalam kurun waktu tertentu.
FireworkerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs a Fireworker, you can plant up to three firework bombs using vanish/by petting. If you're the last impostor standing, you can use vanish/pet to detonate the bombs and cause area damage. But be careful, the bombs can also harm you. If the bombs eliminate all surviving players, it's a victory for the impostors.
MercenaryInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Mercenary, you have a lower kill cooldown than other impostors, but you also have a timer. You must kill someone to reset it. If it gets to 0, you suicide. You can see the timer above your name if it gets below 20 seconds.
MareInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Mare, you have a low kill cooldown but can only kill during lights. Additionally, your name will appear in red during lights. Only assigned to Impostors and cannot be guessed.
VampireInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Vampire, pemain yang kamu gigit baru akan mati beberapa detik kemudian.
WarlockInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Warlock can curse a player while not Shapeshifted. If they vanish/pet after cursing, the closest player to the cursed one is killed, regardless of distance. Only one player can be cursed at a time.

Killing, vanishing/petting, and cursing all have separate cooldowns. The Warlock may freeze in place for a few seconds after killing via cursed player.
ZombieInfoLong: (Impostors):\nZombie has a short kill cooldown but moves very slowly and has very little vision. Zombie will not be voted out by anyone other than the Dictator, and the movement speed of Zombie will gradually slow down as they make kills or time passes.
NinjaInfoLong: (Impostors):\nNinja can use the kill button to mark a target, and if the mark is successful, a shield animation will show as a reminder. The Ninja can then use the vanish/pet to teleport to the marked person and kill the marked person. Ninja cannot kill regularly, but may be able to kill regularly after assassination according to the host's settings.
AnonymousInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAnonymous can use Shapeshift to hack into a target. The hacked target will report the body killed by Anonymous or its own if there is none. Hacking ignores whether a body can be reported. Hacking Lazy Guy is a waste of time.
MinerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nMiner can vanish/pet to teleport back to the last vent they were in.
KillingMachineInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Killing Machine has a very short kill cooldown, but cannot vent, has lower vision, cannot sabotage, cannot report, and cannot call emergency meetings.
EscapistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nEscapist can mark a location by vanishing/petting, and they will be teleported to the marked location when they vanish/pet again (not when unshifting).
WitchInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Witch can kill players directly or cast spells by tapping the kill button once or twice, respectively. Spelled players will have a 「†」 mark next to their name in the next meeting. If the Witch survives until the meeting's end, all spelled players die.
NemesisInfoLong: (Impostors):\nNemesis can't kill while there are other Impostors alive in the game, but can use /rv [player id] after death to kill the specified player.
GodfatherInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs a Godfather, you vote for someone to make them your target. In the next round if someone kills the target, the killer will turn into a Renegade
PuppeteerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nPuppeteers control a player that can kill the next non-impostor who gets too close. If the non-impostor dies on contact, the Puppeteer also dies. Lazy Guy is useless.
TimeThiefInfoLong: (Impostors):\nEvery time the Time Thief kills a player, the meeting time will be reduced by a certain amount of time. If the Time Thief dies, the meeting time will return to normal.
SniperInfoLong: (Impostors):\nIf you want to shoot players from a distance, you'll need to follow these steps. First, you must shapeshift or pet twice to make a successful snipe. Once you've done that, imagine an arrow pointing from your first shapeshift or petting location to your unshift or second petting location. That arrow will show you the direction in which the snipe will be made. Remember that the snipe only kills the first person in its path. Also, you won't be able to kill anyone normally until you use up all of your ammo.
EvilTrackerInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Evil Tracker, kamu dapat melacak target dan mengubah fokus pelacakan dengan menggunakan Shapeshift. Tanda panah di bawah namamu akan menunjukkan arah ke lokasi target. Kamu juga bisa saja melihat kilatan cahaya setiap kali rekan Impostor yang lain membunuh pemain.
EvilGuesserInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Evil Guesser can guess a player's role during the meeting using the command /bt [player id] [role]. If the guess is correct, the target dies; if wrong, the Evil Guesser dies. Use the /id command to view the ID of all players.
AntiAdminerInfoLong:
(Impostor):
Selaku Anti-Adminer, kamu dapat mendeteksi Crewmate atau Netral yang berada di dekat perangkat seperti CCTV, Meja Admin, Monitor Vital, atau Riwayat Akses Pintu. Namun, kamu tidak bisa mengetahui apakah pemain tersebut sedang menggunakan perangkat itu atau tidak; kamu hanya tahu bahwa ada orang di dekat situ.

Tergantung konfigurasi, kamu mungkin bisa menggunakan Shapeshift untuk mengaktifkan ultimatum yang mengharuskan semua pemain di dekat perangkat untuk segera meninggalkan tempat dalam hitungan detik, dengan konsekuensi kematian jika tidak diindahkan.
ArroganceInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Arrogance reduces their kill cooldown with each successful kill of theirs.
BomberInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Bomber can use the vanish/pet button to self-explode, killing players within a certain range. But as a price, the Bomber will also die. Note: All players will see a kill flash when the Bomber explodes.
ScavengerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nScavenger kills do not leave dead bodies behind. To kill someone, you must click your kill button on them, then stay near that person for a few seconds, similar to an Arsonist douse.
TrapsterInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Trapster, you can use your Vanish button to create a fake dead body. Anyone who reports this body will die, and depending on settings the body will be reported.

(Legacy Version):
In the game, the Trapster kills a player and then puts a trap on their body. If another player reports the dead body and it has the Trapster's trap on it, the player who reports will die instantly without the body getting reported. The player killed by the Trapster's trap will also become a Trapster. This chain reaction continues until no more players are left to become Trapsters. However, the Trapster will die immediately after making a kill. It's worth noting that the Trapster's own dead body cannot trigger their trap.
CapitalistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nCapitalists can add a short task to a player by pressing the kill button. Note: using this ability on players who have no tasks or have completed tasks will not take effect.
GangsterInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Gangster can recruit a player to a Madmate by pressing the kill button. If successful, both will see the shield animation as a reminder. The host sets the maximum number of recruits. If recruitment fails, the target is killed normally. When out of recruits, the Gangster can only make normal kills.
CleanerInfoLong:
(Impostor):
Selaku Cleaner, kamu dapat membersihkan mayat dengan menggunakan tombol Report. Dalam artian, mayat tersebut tidak akan bisa dilaporkan (termasuk Bait). Setelah pembersihan selesai, akan muncul animasi proteksi sebagai konfirmasi visual.

Catatan: Kamu hanya bisa membersihkan mayat jika durasi rehat seranganmu sudah selesai.
LightningInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Lightning role cannot make regular kills. When the Lightning uses its kill button, the target will vaporize into a quantum ghost. If a player who is not a quantum ghost touches the quantum ghost, the quantum ghost will die. If the quantum ghost survives until a meeting, they will die after the meeting ends. Interacting with the quantum ghost has no effect. Killing the Lightning may cause the killer to vaporize into a quantum ghost, depending on the host's settings.
GreedyInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Greedy, your kill cooldown is different after every even-numbered kill and every odd-numbered kill of yours. You have a separate cooldown after meetings. Your first kill after every meeting will set your cooldown to the Even-Numbered Kill Cooldown, your second kill will set it to the Odd-Numbered Kill Cooldown, and the process repeats until a meeting is called again.
CursedWolfInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Cursed Wolf, setiap kali ada pemain yang mencoba menyerangmu, kamu akan membalas dengan mengutuk penyerang tersebut hingga tewas.
SoulCatcherInfoLong: (Impostors):\nSoul Catcher can swap places with the shapeshift target after shapeshifting. (If the target is in an abnormal state such as dead, swallowed by pelican, venting, etc., then nothing will happen)
QuickShooterInfoLong: (Impostors):\nWhen the kill cooldown is over, the Quick Shooter can reset the cooldown by either shapeshifting or petting. Additionally, they can store a bullet, and upon successful storage, a shield animation will appear on their body as a reminder. After a Quick Shooter completes a kill, they can offset the kill cooldown with bullets until they run out. At the beginning of each meeting, the Quick Shooter can only keep a certain number of bullets, which the host sets.
CamouflagerInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Camouflager, kamu dapat menyamarkan identitas dan menyeragamkan wujud semua pemain dengan menggunakan tombol Shapeshift. Efek tersebut akan berakhir ketika kamu kembali ke wujud asli atau ada panggilan rapat.
EvilEraserInfoLong: (Impostors):\nDuring the meeting, Evil Eraser can vote for any crew member as a target. The selected crew member's roles will be erased after the meeting concludes. It is important to note that players whose roles have been erased will always be considered as vanilla roles, including the game result page.
ButcherInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Butcher, when you kill someone, they will drop 30 bodies, making it difficult to see who died in the round at the beginning of the meeting.\nIf you kill an Avenger, the game instantly ends with 'Everyone died'.
HangmanInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Hangman, kamu mesti berubah wujud (Shapeshift) menjadi target yang ingin kamu bunuh. Setelah itu, saat kamu membunuh targetmu tersebut, ia akan mati tanpa meninggalkan jejak mayat.\nKamu mampu menembus segala spesialisasi kemampuan.
SwooperInfoLong: (Impostors):\nThe Swooper can Vent/Vanish to temporarily turn invisible. You can kill while being invisible, unlike vanilla Phantom.
CrewpostorInfoLong: (Madmates):\nYou kill the nearest player whenever you complete a task.
WildlingInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Wildling, kamu akan tahan dari serangan selama sementara setiap kali kamu membunuh pemain lain.
TricksterInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Trickster, kamu berperan sebagai Impostor biasa tanpa spesialisasi apa pun. Yang membedakan, kamu dapat berpura-pura menjadi bagian dari tim Crewmate. Sheriff tidak dapat membunuhmu, dan peran investigasi seperti Psychic dan Snitch tidak akan mengungkap identitasmu.
VindicatorInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Vindicator, vote darimu terhitung lebih dari satu.
ParasiteInfoLong: (Madmates):\nAs the Parasite, you may kill, vent, sabotage, whatever. Just know that you are an Impostor.
DisperserInfoLong:
(Impostors):
Disperser can use vanish/pet to teleport all players to random vents.

Note: the Disperser itself will not be teleported with vanish/pet and players who are in the vent cannot be teleported.
InhibitorInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Inhibitor, you can only kill when there is not a critical sabotage active (e.g., Lights or Reactor).
SaboteurInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Saboteur, you can only kill when there is a critical sabotage active (e.g., Comms or O2). Whenever you kill, another random critical sabotage will be activated on top of the ongoing one.
CouncillorInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Councillor, you can kill players during a meeting like a Judge.

When killing in a meeting, those kills will appear as a trial from a Judge.

The kill command is /tl [player id]
You can see the player's id before the player's name, or use the /id command to view the id of all players.
DazzlerInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Dazzler, kamu dapat memperpendek jarak pandang pemain lain melalui Shapeshift. Jika kamu mati, jarak pandang korbanmu akan kembali normal.
DeathpactInfoLong:
(Impostor):
Selaku Deathpact, kamu dapat menjerat pemain lain dalam pakta kematian melalui Shapeshift. Setelah jumlah pemain yang diperlukan terpenuhi, mereka wajib bertemu dalam kurun waktu yang telah ditetapkan. Jika terlambat, mereka akan mati.

Jika salah satu dari pemain yang terikat ada yang terbunuh, pakta akan ditarik kembali.
DevourerInfoLong:
(Impostor):
Selaku Devourer, kamu dapat mengubah wujud pemain lain secara permanen melalui Shapeshift. Setiap kali kamu mengubah wujud seorang pemain, durasi rehat seranganmu akan berkurang beberapa detik.

Apabila kamu tereliminasi, semua pemain yang telah kamu ubah wujudnya akan kembali ke wujud aslinya.
MorphlingInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Morphling, kamu hanya bisa membunuh disaat dalam mode Shapeshift.
TwisterInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Twister, you can use vanishing/petting to swap the position of all players randomly.

The Twister itself will not swap places with anyone, and players who are in vents cannot be teleported.
LurkerInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Lurker, kamu bisa mendapat pengurangan durasi rehat serangan dengan memasuki ventilasi. Setelah membunuh pemain, durasi rehat serangan akan kembali ke angka semula.
ConvictInfoLong: (Madmate):\nSelaku Convict, kamu kini berpihak pada Impostor.
VisionaryInfoLong: (Impostor):\nSelaku Visionary, Shapeshift menjadi target untuk mengungkap basis timnya. Setelah terungkap, warna nama target akan berubah secara permanen sesuai dengan kubu (<#8cffff>Crewmate</color>/<#ff1919>Impostor</color>/<#ffab1b>Netral</color>/<#7b3fbb>Coven</color>).
RenegadeInfoLong: (Madmates):\nAs the Renegade, help the Impostors win.
UnderdogInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Underdog, your kill cooldown is longer until there's a certain amount of players alive. After that, your cooldown is shorter.
ConsigliereInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Consigliere, you can reveal the roles of other players using your kill button.

Single click: Reveal role
Double click: Kill

If you run out of reveal uses, your kill button functions normally.
LuckeyInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Luckey, kamu berpeluang selamat dari serangan. Si penyerang akan melihat animasi proteksi jika serangannya gagal, tapi kamu sendiri tidak akan tahu.
LazyGuyInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nLazy Guy has one task and is immune to Impostor abilities. No add-ons.
SuperStarInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Super Star, kamu mempunyai ikon bintang di samping namamu dan hanya bisa dibunuh saat tidak ada pemain lain di sekitar. Selain itu, peranmu juga anti-tebak.
DemolitionistInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Demolitionist, jika kamu terbunuh, si pembunuh harus masuk ke ventilasi dalam batas waktu yang ditetapkan untuk menghindari kematian. Setelah masuk pun, ia harus tetap berada di dalam ventilasi sampai timer tersebut berakhir.
TaskManagerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nYou see the total number of tasks completed (by everyone all together) next to your role name, which updates in real-time.
NiceEraserInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSebagai Nice Eraser, kamu dapat menghapus peran pemain yang kamu vote saat rapat. Setelah rapat selesai, peran pemain yang kamu hapus akan kembali ke basis dasar dari perannya.
MayorInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Mayor, suara yang kamu berikan saat voting memiliki bobot lebih dari satu suara. Kamu juga bisa saja mendapatkan opsi alternatif untuk mengadakan rapat dengan memanfaatkan ventilasi.
ParanoidInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nParanoid can call a meeting by venting/petting. The report animation will show a dead body with Paranoid's color, but the Paranoid is not dead.
PsychicInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Psychic sees red highlighted names during the meeting, indicating at least one evil player. All Neutrals and Killing Crewmates are displayed as red names when the Psychic becomes a Madmate.
MechanicInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nMechanic can use vent anytime. Can fix Reactors, O2, and Comms using one side. Lights fixed with one switch. Opening one door opens all doors.
SheriffInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Sheriff, kamu tidak memiliki misi dan bebas menembak pemain yang kamu curigai sebagai Impostor. Namun, manakala kamu salah menembak Crewmate, kamu akan gugur. Jika kamu menjadi Madmate, kamu mungkin bisa membunuh siapa saja, termasuk tim Crewmate.
SnitchInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nSelaku Snitch, kamu akan mengetahui identitas Impostor setelah menuntaskan seluruh misi, dengan nama yang ditampilkan berwarna merah saat rapat. Ketika misimu hampir selesai (lazimnya tersisa satu), kamu dan para Impostor akan ditandai dengan ikon bintang. Ikon tersebut akan berubah merah bila kamu beralih status menjadi Madmate.
MarshallInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Marshall, identitasmu akan terungkap kepada semua Crewmate setelah kamu merampungkan misi. Tergantung konfigurasi, tim lain mungkin juga akan mengetahuinya.
SpeedBoosterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nSpeed Booster increases a random player's movement speed every time they complete a task.
DoctorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Doctor can view players' cause of death and access their vitals as long as their battery is still operational.
DictatorInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Dictator, sekali kamu menjatuhkan pilihan pada satu pemain saat voting, rapat akan langsung berakhir dan pemain tersebut akan tereliminasi, begitu juga dengan dirimu.
ForensicInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nAfter reporting the body, the Forensic receives a clue about the victim's role. The host may reveal the murderer's role to the Forensic based on the setting. Note: Forensic won't be Oblivious.
UndercoverInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Impostors knows who Undercover is and sees him as a teammate, but Undercover himself does not know who the Impostors are.
NiceGuesserInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nNice Guesser can guess a player's role during the meeting. Correct guess results in killing the target, while a wrong one leads to suicide. Use the command /bt [player id] [role] to guess. You can see player IDs before their names or use the /id command.
VigilanteInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nVigilante can kill anyone, but only once. After killing, Vigilante can do tasks. Depending on settings, Vigilante can vent.
TransporterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Transporter, after you finish tasks, you can use the shapeshift menu to select 2 targets to swap their locations.
TimeManagerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nTime Manager increases meeting time. If it dies, the meeting time returns to normal. If it becomes Madmate, skill changes to reducing meeting time.
VeteranInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Veteran, kamu dapat mengaktifkan mode siaga dengan memasuki ventilasi atau menekan tombol Pet. Apabila ada pemain yang menyerangmu saat mode siaga tersebut aktif, si penyerang akan langsung tewas.
CopyCatInfoLong:
(Crewmate):
As the Copycat, you can use your kill button to copy the target's role.

You can only copy some crewmate roles.
According to host settings if you try to copy non-crew or a Rascal's role you may kill them instead.

Additionally, You do not have access to guessing, and you commit suicide after miscopying a certain number of times that the host sets.
BodyguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Bodyguard can prevent a kill by sacrificing themselves when a player is about to be killed nearby. Their skills impact any team, but when they become a Madmate and the murderer is an Impostor, their skill won't activate.
CounterfeiterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Deceiver can sell the counterfeit to other players through the kill button. If the counterfeit is sold successfully, the Deceiver will see a shield animation on their body as a reminder. The counterfeit will take effect after the end of the next meeting. If the player with no kill ability holds the counterfeit, he will kill himself immediately. If the player with the killing ability has the counterfeit, he will commit suicide when he tries to kill someone next time.
GrenadierInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nGrenadiers can use a vent/pet to throw a flashbang that impairs Impostors' vision. The flashbang may also affect neutrals, depending on the host's settings. The Grenadier will see a shield animation on their body after the flashbang takes effect. Flashbangs only work on Crewmates when the Grenadier becomes a Madmate.
LighterInfoLong:
(Crewmate):
As the Lighter, you can vent/pet to increase your vision temporarily. You have increased vision both when the lights are not out and when the lights are out.

Use this power to catch sneaky killers!
MedicInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
The Medic can place a shield on a player by pressing the Kill button. After placing the shield, Medic can do tasks.

Depending on settings:
- When the Medic dies, the shield will be removed.
- The Medic can see if someone is trying to break the target's shield.
- The Medic or the target themself see whether shield is placed or not (shown as a green circle 「●」 next to the name)
- The shield is removed after someone tries to kill the protected player.
FortuneTellerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Fortune Teller can get a clue to a player's role by voting for them in a meeting. Once all tasks are complete, they get the exact role instead of a clue.
GlitchInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Glitch, your goal is to kill everyone on the ship. You can hack players to prevent them from killing, venting, sabotaging, and reporting dead bodies for a limited time. You can also call sabotage or pet to disguise as a random player for a limited time (the sabotage won't occur).
JudgeInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Judge can judge a player during the meeting. If the target is evil, it's killed; if it's wrong, the Judge dies. Use the /tl [player id] command to judge and /id to view player IDs. Judges can judge all players when they're Madmate.
MorticianInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nWhen the Mortician reports a body, they will know the last player the victim had contact with. Note: Mortician won't be Oblivious or Seer.
MediumInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Medium can contact a dead player after they are reported. The dead player can answer once with a YES or NO to the Medium's question (using /ms yes or /ms no). The Medium won't be Oblivious.
ObserverInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Observer can see all shield animations caused by other players after the first meeting.
MonarchInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Monarch, you can knight players to give them an extra vote.

You cannot knight someone who already has extra votes.
Knighted players appear with a golden name.
PacifistInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nPacifist resets kill cooldown for all players with kill button on vent/pet. Madmate only works on Crewmates.
InvestigatorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs an Investigator, use your kill button to reveal the role of a nearby player. A 「○」 will be displayed next to the reveal target. Stay near the target for a defined time to reveal their role.
CoronerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs a Coroner, you can't report corpses; instead, after trying to report the corpse, you will see an arrow leading you to the killer. If a meeting is called, the arrows disappear. Depending on the setting, the body you found cannot be reported.
ScoutInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs a Scout, you can vote for a player in the meeting, which will mark their position for you in the game with arrows. In addition, at the beginning of a meeting, you will be shown in which room the player was last if the option is activated.
MerchantInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Merchant, you sell a random Add-on to a random player for each task you complete. Each Add-on sold earns you money. If you have a certain amount of money, you can avert the next killing attempt against you by bribing the murderer. The bribed player won't be able to kill you, but you don't know who it is. The bribe money used is lost and is not available for additional bribes.
DeputyInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Deputy, use your kill button on a player to reset their kill cooldown.

If the target does not have a kill button, then the handcuff was a waste.
GuardianInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Guardian, kamu akan abadi setelah menuntaskan misi. Artinya, kamu menjadi kebal terhadap serangan sampai akhir permainan. Meski begitu, pemain lain mungkin masih bisa menebak peranmu saat rapat.
AddictInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nThe Addict has a suicide timer indicated by the vent cooldown. If the timer expires, the Addict dies. After venting, the Addict is immortal for a certain time. The Addict is also frozen for a defined time after freezing and cannot report any bodies.
TracefinderInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Tracefinder, kamu dapat mengakses panel vital portabel layaknya Scientist. Selain itu, kamu juga akan melihat panah yang menuntunmu ke tempat mayat berada.
OracleInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Oracle, you may vote for a player during a meeting. You'll see if they are a crewmate, neutral, or Impostor. But be careful! This has a chance of giving you an incorrect result! (The host sets the chance)
SpiritualistInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Spiritualist, you will get an arrow pointing to the ghost of the body that was reported in the last meeting.

If the player was good, it may lead you to an Impostor or neutral killer.
If the player was bad, it may just lead you to a fellow crewmate.
ChameleonInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Chameleon, you can vent to disguise (invisible). While disguising, nobody can interact with you. Venting while disguised will reveal yourself.
InspectorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nTo check if two players are on the same team, use the command /cp [player id 1] [player id 2]. Neutral killers are counted as part of the same team. Non-Killing Neutrals are counted as separate teams. The Trickster is counted as crew, and Madmates are counted as Impostor. The Lawyer/Follower and its target count as the same team. You will receive an affirmation message if they are in the same team or a denial message if they are not.
TimeMasterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Time Master, use the vents/pet to rewind time to a few seconds before. Players will be teleported back to their positions from that time. Players who died within that time will be revived.
CrusaderInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Crusader, use your kill button to crusade a player. If that player gets attacked, you'll kill the attacker.
ArsonistInfoLong:
(Netral):
Selaku Arsonist, kamu bisa menyiram pemain lain dengan mengklik tombol Kill. Kemudian, ikuti pemain tersebut selama beberapa detik sampai muncul animasi proteksi di pemain tersebut, yang menandakan penyiraman telah berhasil (animasi tersebut hanya terlihat olehmu).

Nama pemain yang sedang disiram akan menampilkan simbol 「△」, dan kalau sudah selesai tersiram, simbolnya berubah menjadi 「▲」.

Setelah berhasil menyiram semua pemain yang masih hidup, silakan masuk ventilasi untuk mulai pembakaran. Kamu akan kalah jika tidak berhasil menewaskan seluruh pemain.
JesterInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Jester, kamu baru bisa menang hanya jika terbuang saat rapat.
TerroristInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Terrorist, kamu akan menang sendirian jika tereliminasi setelah misi rampung
ExecutionerInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Executioner, kamu memiliki target eksekusi yang ditandai dengan simbol 「♦」 di samping namanya. Jika target tersebut terbuang saat rapat, kamu akan menang.
LawyerInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Lawyer, kamu punya klien yang harus kamu bela, ditandai dengan simbol 「♦」 di samping namanya. Kemenangan atau kekalahanmu sepenuhnya bergantung pada hasil yang diraih oleh klienmu.
OpportunistInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Opportunist, jika kamu berhasil bertahan hidup hingga akhir permainan, kamu akan ikut menang bersama tim yang menang.
VectorInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nVector will win alone by venting a certain number of times.
JackalInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Jackal, kamu dapat merekrut pemain lain menjadi bagian dari timmu dengan menggunakan tombol Kill. Apabila kamu tereliminasi, pemain yang telah kamu rekrut akan menjadi Jackal yang baru. Kemenangan akan kamu raih jika unggul jumlah dan tidak ada lagi tim jahat lain yang masih hidup.
GodInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku God, kamu sudah mengetahui peran setiap pemain sejak awal permainan. Kalau kamu mampu bertahan hingga akhir permainan, kemenangan akan menjadi milikmu sendiri.
InnocentInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Innocent, kamu dapat menggunakan tombol bunuh untuk menjebak pemain lain, dengan mengorbankan dirimu sendiri. Jika pemain yang dijebak tersebut terbuang saat rapat, kamu akan menang.
PelicanInfoLong:
(Netral):
Selaku Pelican, kamu dapat menggunakan tombol Kill untuk 'menelan' pemain, dalam artian memindahkan pemain tersebut ke tepi arena permainan. Mekanisme kemampuan Pelican bukanlah pembunuhan biasa, sehingga sebagian besar peran spesialis defense menjadi tidak berguna.

Saat ada panggilan rapat atau laporan mayat, semua pemain yang ditelan akan langsung mati. Jika kamu mati atau terputus koneksi, semua pemain yang ditelan akan dikembalikan ke lokasi terakhirmu.
RevolutionistInfoLong:
(Netral):
Selaku Revolutionist, kamu dapat merekrut pemain dengan menggunakan tombol Kill padanya dan mengikutinya selama beberapa detik. Jika perekrutan berhasil, akan muncul animasi proteksi sebagai konfirmasi visual. Namun, ada kemungkinan target justru terbunuh saat direkrut, dengan probabilitas yang ditentukan oleh pengaturan konfigurasi.

Kamu dan para rekrutanmu akan menang jika sejumlah pemain (yang disyaratkan harus terekrut) memasuki ventilasi dalam waktu yang ditentukan. Jika ada pemain yang direkrut tidak melakukannya, pemain tersebut akan tewas. Kamu sendiri akan gugur jika terbunuh selama proses pengumpulan rekrutan atau terbuang saat rapat. Rekrutan yang telah mati tetap bisa menang bersamamu jika revolusi berhasil terlaksana.
HaterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Hater, you can kill as often as you want with no cooldown and have impostor vision. You can only kill Lovers, recruited players, and recruiting roles, or you will die. Winning is possible if you kill at least one player during the game.
DemonInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nDemon has a unique health-based killing system, and killing takes effect when one's health is exhausted. If a Demon's health is consumed but they are not killed, the murderer will see a shield animation as a reminder.
StalkerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Stalker can kill anyone and cause electricity sabotage. They cannot vent. If the Stalker is alive and the Impostor or Crewmate wins, the Stalker wins alone.
WorkaholicInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nWorkaholics win by completing more tasks, maybe even after their death.
CollectorInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Collector, kamu bisa mengumpulkan seluruh vote yang diarahkan kepada target tertentu dalam rapat. Setelah mengumpulkan jumlah vote yang dipersyaratkan, kamu akan menang—sekalipun target terbuang.
PoisonerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Poisoner, your kills are delayed. Kill everyone to win.
SidekickInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Sidekick, tugasmu adalah membantu Jackal dalam mengeliminasi pemain. Jika Jackal mati, kamu akan menjadi Jackal yang baru dan bisa merekrut pemain lain dengan tombol Kill. Kemenangan akan diraih setelah unggul jumlah dan tidak ada lagi tim jahat lain yang masih hidup.
ProvocateurInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Provocateur, kamu bisa membunuh target apa pun menggunakan tombol Kill. Jika di akhir permainan targetmu kalah, kamu akan menang bersama tim yang menang.
BloodKnightInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Blood Knight, kamu akan tahan dari serangan selama beberapa detik setiap kali kamu membunuh pemain lain.
PlagueBearerInfoLong:
(Netral):
Selaku Plaguebearer, kamu dapat menyebarkan wabah ke seluruh pemain dengan menggunakan tombol Kill. Setelah wabah menyebar sepenuhnya, kamu akan beralih peran menjadi Pestilence.

Kemenangan hanya akan bisa kamu raih setelah menjadi Pestilence.
PestilenceInfoLong: (Netral):\nDengan menjadi Pestilence, kamu kebal terhadap sebagian besar serangan dan memiliki kemampuan untuk membunuh. Setiap serangan yang diarahkan kepadamu akan dipantulkan kembali ke penyerang. Kamu akan tereliminasi hanya jika terbuang atau mengalami salah tebak saat rapat.
FollowerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nThe Follower can start following someone by using their Kill button and switch targets by using it again. If the Follower's target wins, the Follower will win, too. They can even win after they die.
CultistInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nIf there are more Cultists than Crewmates and only these two teams remain, the Cultist team wins. The Cultist can charm a non-neutral player by pressing the kill button, making them a part of the Cultist team with new victory conditions.
HexMasterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Hex Master, you can hex players or kill them. Hexing a player works the same as spelling as a Witch.
WraithInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Wraith, you can Vent/Vanish to go invisible temporarily. You can kill while being invisible.

Kill; everyone to win.
SerialKillerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Serial Killer, your job is to murder everyone to win simply.
JuggernautInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Juggernaut, setiap kali kamu membunuh pemain, durasi rehat seranganmu akan berkurang.
VirusInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Virus, kamu dapat menginfeksi mayat Crewmate yang kamu bunuh. Jika ada Crewmate lain yang melaporkan mayat yang terinfeksi tersebut, pemain itu akan bergabung dengan tim Virus, atau justru mati jika kamu tidak terbuang pada saat rapat. Tim Virus akan menang jika unggul jumlah dari tim Crewmate.
PursuerInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Pursuer, kamu dapat menggunakan kemampuanmu pada pemain lain untuk mereset durasi rehat serangannya jika nanti ia melancarkan serangan.
SpecterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Specter, your job is to get killed and finish your tasks. You can do your tasks while alive. You cannot win if you're alive. If you complete all tasks while you're alive, then get killed, you win with the winning team at the end.
JinxInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Jinx, manakala kamu menjadi target serangan, si penyerang akan tewas tertimpa nasib sial.
MaverickInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Maverick, kamu bebas membunuh sesuka hati. Kamu akan menang bersama tim yang menang, asalkan kamu sudah memenuhi jumlah minimal pembunuhan yang disyaratkan. Dan yap, kalau kamu sampai mati, kamu kalah.
RitualistInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Ritualist, kamu dapat mengungkap peran pemain lain dengan menggunakan tombol Kill. Setelah kesempatan mengungkap habis, tombol Kill akan kembali berfungsi normal sebagai mode membunuh.
PickpocketInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Pickpocket, you steal votes from your kills.

Kill everyone to win.
TraitorInfoLong:
(Netral):
Selaku Traitor, kamu adalah mantan Impostor yang berbalik melawan timmu. Kamu mengetahui identitas semua Impostor, tetapi mereka tidak mengenalimu. Mereka dapat membunuhmu, sedangkan kamu tidak dapat sebaliknya.

Eliminasi para Impostor dengan pendekatan lain, lalu habisi semua pemain lain yang tersisa untuk meraih kemenangan!
VultureInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Vulture, kamu dapat Report mayat saat kemampuan Makan siap digunakan (yang membuat mayat tersebut takkan bisa di-Report oleh pemain lain). Jika kemampuan Makan sedang dalam durasi rehat atau kamu sudah mencapai batas maksimal mayat yang bisa dimakan per ronde, kamu akan Report mayat secara normal. Adapun persyaratan menang, kamu harus berhasil memakan sejumlah mayat sesuai dengan ketentuan sebelum permainan berakhir.
MedusaInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Medusa, you can stone bodies much like cleaning a body when your kill cooldown is up. Stoned bodies cannot be reported.

Kill everyone to win.
SpiritcallerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Spiritcaller, your victims become Evil Spirits after they die. These spirits can help you win by freezing other players for a short time and/or blocking their vision. Alternatively, the spirits can give you a shield that protects you briefly from an attempted kill.
AmnesiacInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Amnesiac, use your kill or report button (depends on the Host's settings) on a player/body to copy their role.\nSettings may alter the role you get in a few specific scenarios.
DoomsayerInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Doomsayer, kamu dipersilakan untuk menebak peran dari pemain lain. Kamu akan menang jika sudah berhasil menebak sejumlah peran dengan benar.
LoversInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nLovers win together and may die together if one is exiled or killed. They can see the ♥ mark next to each other's name. If one of the lovers wins at the end, the other wins too.
MadmateInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nMadmates assist the Impostors in winning the game. They are only available to Crewmates but can identify Impostors depending on the host's settings. Certain roles like Sheriff, Snitch, and Mayor can become Madmates. The abilities of some roles change when they become Madmates. For example, the Grenadier's flash bomb works on Crewmates and Neutrals instead of Impostors. The Judge can judge anyone.
WatcherInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nDuring the meeting, Watcher can see everyone's votes.
MagnetInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen you kill, your victims lunge to you, instead of you lunging to them
SleuthInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou know the roles of the bodies you report.
TaskcounterInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nTask Counter can see the total number of tasks completed (by everyone all together) next to their role name, which updates in real-time.
BloodlustInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou can kill. You are a neutral killer while keeping your role's ability (as much as host-only limitations allow).\nIf your role has an ability to be used through the kill button, you can single-click to use your ability and double-click the kill button to kill.
StainedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYour killer gets a violet name for 3 seconds.
ClumsyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhile walking, you have a small chance of tripping, meaning you freeze for a few seconds.
DiscoInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou change your skin color every few seconds.
SonarInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou see an arrow pointing to the nearest player.
TorchInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nOnly Crewmates will get Torch, who have increased vision and may not be affected by Lights Sabotage.
SeerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen a player dies, the Seer sees a red flash (with an alarm sound like sabotage).
TiebreakerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nIn case of a tie, the target voted by the Tiebreaker has priority. However, if multiple Tiebreakers choose different targets simultaneously, their skills will not take effect.
ObliviousInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nForensic and Cleaners won't be Oblivious. Oblivious cannot report dead bodies. Note: Bait killed by Oblivious will still be reported automatically, and Oblivious can still be used as a scapegoat for Anonymous.
BewilderInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nBewilder's vision changes killer's vision on death.
TruantInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAfter each meeting, you freeze in place for a set amount of seconds.
WorkhorseInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nComplete all tasks to become Workhorse and get extra tasks set by the host.
FoolInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou can't fix Lights and Comms sabotages.
AvengerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nHost can allow Impostor to become Avenger. If Avenger dies, they'll revenge a random player.
YoutuberInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nIf the YouTuber is the first player killed, they win. If not, they follow the Crewmate to win. Note: Indirect killing methods don't trigger the YouTuber's skills.
EgoistInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nOnly impostors can get Egoist. If the impostor team wins while there's at least one Impostor alive who isn't an Egoist, the Egoist loses.\nIn order for the Egoist to win, they must eject all other impostors and stay alive.
StealerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nStealers gets additional votes every time they kill someone.
SchizophrenicInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nNeutrals and Madmates can't become Schizophrenic. The Schizophrenic will be considered as two players in the game. Having at least one player as Schizophrenic won't end the game if there are only them and the Impostor left.
MimicInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nMimic is an Impostor role. When a Mimic dies, other Impostors receive a message during meetings that reveals the roles killed by the Mimic.
GuesserInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As a guesser, guess the roles of players in meetings to kill them. Guessing wrong kills you instead.

The guessing command is: /bt [player id] [role]
You can see the player's id before the player's name, or use the /id command to view the id of all players.
NecroviewInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
The Necroview can see the teams of dead players. The following info will be displayed on the dead player's name while in a meeting:
- The Red name indicates the Impostors.
- The Cyan name indicates the Crewmates.
- The Orange name indicates the Neutrals.
ReachInfoLong: (Add-on)\nOnly roles with a kill button can get this add-on. You have the longest kill range possible in the game, unlike everyone else.
BaitInfoLong: (Add-on):\nJika kamu terbunuh, pelakunya akan otomatis self-report. Maka dari itu, beberapa impostor dan netral sebisa mungkin tidak akan membunuh pemain yang mendapat add-on Bait. Namun, ada pengecualian terhadap beberapa peran tertentu.
BeartrapInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen Beartrap is killed, Beartrap immobilizes killer for a configurable amount of time.
CharmedInfoLong: (Betrayal Add-ons):\nThe Charmed add-on is obtained by being charmed by the Cultist. Once charmed, you are now on the Cultist's team and no longer on your original team.
OnboundInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Onbound add-on, you cannot be guessed in meetings.
KnightedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen a Monarch knights someone, they get an extra vote.
AsthmaticInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou're playing Stop And Go. You always have a symbol below your name with a timer that is red or green. You cannot move when the symbol/timer is red. The timer indicates when the color will change.
DisregardedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Disregarded add-on, your corpse cannot be reported.
HasteInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Haste add-on, your kill cooldown continues to go down at all times.
ContagiousInfoLong:
(Add-on Pengkhianat):
Setelah Virus menginfeksi dirimu, kamu menjadi Contagious. Pemain yang menjadi Contagious akan tergabung di tim Virus.

Mati atau tidaknya kamu seusai rapat, tergantung konfigurasi untuk Virus.
LuckyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWith the Lucky add-on, there is a probability for you to evade the kill; the specific probability is set by the host. When the evasion takes effect, the killer will see the shield animation, but you will not know anything.
DoubleShotInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen a player with Double Shot guesses a role incorrectly, they will get a second chance to guess, but the next wrong guess will result in suicide.
RascalInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Rascal, you can die to the Sheriff, and Snitch can find you if Snitch can find madmates.

Only assigned to Crewmates, cannot be assigned by the Merchant.
GravestoneInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Gravestone, your role is revealed to everyone when you die.
LazyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Lazy, you are too lazy to walk to the meeting table when meetings are called, so you start the next round exactly where you ended the previous one, and you're also immune to Warlocks, Puppeteers, and Gangsters.
AutopsyInfoLong: (Add-on):\nKamu bisa mengetahui penyebab kematian setiap pemain.
LoyalInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Loyal, you cannot be recruited by roles such as Jackal or Cultist.

Cannot be assigned to neutrals.
EvilSpiritInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs Evil Spirit, it's your job to help the Spiritcaller to victory. You can use your Haunt button to freeze players and reduce their vision. Alternatively, you can use your Haunt button to give the Spiritcaller a shield against a kill attempt temporarily.
GlowInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Glow, your name is colored during a lights sabotage.
DiseasedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen someone tries to use the kill button on you, their cooldown will be increased by a configurable amount of time
AntidoteInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nWhen someone tries to use the kill button on you, their cooldown will be decreased by a configurable amount of time
SwiftInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Swift, your kills will not cause you to lunge.
UndeadInfoLong: (Add-on):\nAdd-on ini disematkan kepada pemain yang direkrut oleh Necromancer dan Deathknight untuk menjadi bagian dari faksi Undead.
UnluckyInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Unlucky, doing tasks, killing, or venting as a chance to kill you.
SunglassesInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Sunglasses, your vision is reduced.
GMInfoLong: (None):\nThe Game Master is an observer role. Their presence does not affect the game; all players know who the Game Master is. The Game Master role will be assigned to the host, who will automatically become a ghost at the start of the game.
SunnyboyInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Sunnyboy, kamu dapat memeriksa status hidup/mati pemain lain melalui panel kehidupan. Selama kamu masih hidup, permainan tidak akan berakhir karena keunggulan jumlah. Jika kamu mati di akhir permainan, kamu akan menang bersama tim pemenang.
BardInfoLong: (Impostors):\nWhen a bard is alive, the exile confirmation will display a sentence composed by the bard. Whenever the bard completes a creation, the bard's kill cooldown is permanently halved.
NukerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Nuker, you're a stronger Bomber. vanish/pet to nuke everyone. You can't kill, and you die in your explosion.

MessengerInfo: Send a Message to Players After Death
MessengerInfoLong: (Add-ons): As the Messenger, after you die, you can send a message in a meeting to the alive players by typing /hm {number}, replacing {number} with the corresponding index of the messages listed below: 1. The player that killed me was last in Example: The player that killed me was last in Cafeteria 2. The killer's role is Example: The killer's role is Ninja 3. I was a(n) Example: I was a Crewmate Example use: /hm 1 - This will send the first message to the alive players.

EvolverInfo: Select an Upgrade After Each Meeting
EvolverInfoLong: (Neutrals): As the Evolver, you can choose an upgrade after each meeting. Pet to cycle between the available upgrades. The same upgrade can appear multiple times. Once the timer to pick ends, your upgrade will be applied. Upgrades: - Decrease Kill Cooldown (by 2.5s) - Gain Impostor Vision (unaffected by lights sabotage) - Increase Vision (by 0.4x) - Increase Speed (by 0.25x) - Increase Kill Distance (Short → Medium → Long) - Gain Venting Ability (and 1 use) - Increase Venting Use Limit (by 3) - Gain Sabotage Ability (and 1 use) - Increase Sabotage Use Limit (by 2) - Gain Shield (cannot be killed in the current round) Remarks: If you can vent, the number of vent uses you have is displayed next to your role name like this: (V: 1) - Same with the sabotage use limit: (S: 2)
EvolverSuffix: <size=85%>Selected upgrade will be applied in <#00ffa5>{0}s</color>\nSelected upgrade: <#00ffa5>{1}</color> (Pet to cycle)\n<size=70%>Available upgrades: <#00ffa5>{2}</color></size></size>

UndertakerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Undertaker, you can mark your target using your kill button, then vanish/pet to kill them. However, the person you assassinate will teleport to your location when you shapeshift, so their body will be wherever you are! Use this well to hide bodies!
RomanticInfo: Select your partner and win with them
RomanticInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Romantic, you can first use your kill button on someone to select them as your partner.
After that, as long as both you and your partner are alive, you can use your kill button on anyone to give your partner a temporarily shield. If your partner wins, you win too.

If your partner dies, your role will change according to the following conditions:
If your partner had a kill button of any type, you will get the same role as they were.
If your partner was a Non-Killing Neutral or your partner died by themselves (suicided or has no real killer), you will turn into the Ruthless Romantic, which is a basic neutral killer: Be the last one standing to win. If you win, your partner wins too.
If your target was an Impostor, you become a Renegade. Your job is now to help the impostors (and thus your partner) win.
In every other case, you become the Vengeful Romantic. Your goal is to kill the killer of your partner. If you do so, you and your partner win with the winning team. If you try to kill anyone else, you will die.
VengefulRomanticInfo: Kill the killer of your Partner
VengefulRomanticInfoLong: (Neutral):\nAs Vengeful Romantic you need to  kill the killer of your partner. You only get one shot. If you kill wrong player, you misfire. Upon killing the right target you win with the winning team along with your Romantic Partner
RuthlessRomanticInfoLong: (Neutral):\nYou become Ruthless Romantic if your Romantic Partner (a Neutral Killer) was killed. Now you go on a killing spree and kill eveyrone. You win with your Romantic Partner if you are the only one left.
RomanticBetOnYou: The Romantic chose you as their Partner!
RomanticGetsPartnerConvertedAddons: <color=#ff1493>Romantic</color> gets the converted add-ons of their partner
RomanticArrows: <color=#ff1493>Romantic</color> has arrows pointing to their Partner
RomanticPartnerHasArrows: Partner has arrows pointing to the <color=#FF1493>Romantic</color>
SpiritualistTargetMessage: <color=#ffff00>The Spiritualist has an arrow pointing toward you</color>
EnableGameTimeLimit: Enable Game Time Limit (Expired = No One Wins)
GaslighterInfoLong: (Netral): Selaku Gaslighter, tombol Kill-mu memiliki efek kemampuan yang berbeda di setiap ronde. Ronde 1: Membunuh secara normal. Ronde 2: Merekrut pemain. Ronde 3: Mengutuk pemain. Ronde 4: Memberikan proteksi kepada pemain. Setelah Ronde 4, siklusnya akan berulang.
Gaslighter.Kill: Di ronde ini, kamu membunuh <#ff1919>secara normal</color>
Gaslighter.Shield: Di ronde ini, kamu <#00ff97>memberikan proteksi</color> pada pemain lain
TechnicianInfoLong: (Netral):\nSelaku Technician, tugasmu adalah memperbaiki sejumlah sabotase dan mengumpulkan poin yang dipersyaratkan untuk memenangkan permainan.
Technician.PointGain.Electrical: Poin yang diperoleh setelah memperbaiki listrik

Technician.PointGain.LifeSupp: Poin yang diperoleh setelah memperbaiki O2

SpeedrunnerInfoLong: (Crewmate):\nSelaku Speedrunner, kalau kamu mampu merampungkan misi selagi masih hidup, permainan akan langsung dimenangkan oleh tim Crewmate.
HypocriteInfoLong: (Madmate):\nSelaku Hypocrite, apabila misimu rampung saat masih hidup, permainan akan langsung berakhir, dan tim Impostor dinyatakan menang.
Hypocrite.NonImpGetsNotifyWhenLowTasks: Para pemain Non-Impostor akan menerima notifikasi apabila misi dari <#ff1919>Hypocrite</color> hampir rampung
LookoutInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Lookout, you can see the IDs of every player at all times. This allows you to see through shapeshifts and camouflages.
WitnessInfo: Find out if someone killed recently
WitnessInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nWhen you use your kill button on someone, it tells you if the player killed recently or not. The yellow exclamation mark means they've killed, and the green chech mark means they've not.
WitnessTime: Max Time after killing where killer appears red
DeadlyQuotaInfo: You don't win if you didn't kill enough
DeadlyQuotaInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nDeadly Quota is an add-on that only impostors can get. The holder of this add-on will need to get a specified amount of kills (or more) to be able to win. If their win condition triggers before getting a required amount of kills, the player loses even if they were supposed to win.
CircumventInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nCircumvent is an add-on that only impostors can get. The holder of this add-on will not be able to use vents (or only limited times per game or round).
DamoclesInfoLong: (Add-ons): Damocles is an add-on that only impostors can get. The holder of this add-on will constantly have a timer displayed next to their role name. If the timer expires, the holder dies. The timer stops during meetings. Below is a list of what increases your time and what lowers your suicide timer: [+] You, or another impostor or madmate kills [+] Entering a vent you didn't enter this round yet [+] Surviving a meeting [+] A player not on your team gets ejected [-] Fixing a sabotage [-] An impostor or a madmate dies [-] Reporting a dead body or calling a meeting [-] A player on your team gets ejected
StressedInfoLong: (Add-ons): Stressed is an add-on that only crewmates with tasks can get. The holder of this add-on will constantly have a timer displayed next to their role name. If the timer expires, the holder dies. The timer stops during meetings. Below is a list of what increases your time and what lowers your suicide timer: [+] Completing a task [+] A non-crewmate player dies [+] Surviving a meeting [+] A non-crewmate player gets ejected [+] Fixing a sabotage [+] Reporting a dead body or calling a meeting [-] A crewmate gets ejected
StressedExtraTimeAfterTask: Time Gained After Completing a Task
StressedExtraTimeAfterImpostorDeath: Time Gained When a Non-Crewmate Player Dies
StressedExtraTimeAfterImpostorEjected: Time Gained When a Non-Crewmate Players Gets Ejected

StressedExtraTimeAfterReporting: Time Gained For Reporting a Dead Body
StressedTimePenaltyAfterCrewmateEjected: Time Penalty When a Crewmate Gets Ejected

CommandArgs.Fabricate.DeathReason: The fake death reason (must be available in the mod)
Commands.ChangeSettingHelp: Arguments: - map (theskeld/mirahq/polus/dlekseht/airship/thefungle/custom) - impostors (number) - players (number) - recommended (on/off) - confirmejects (on/off) - emergencymeetings (number) - anonymousvotes (on/off) - emergencycooldown (number) - discussiontime (number) - votingtime (number) - playerspeed (float) - crewmatevision (float) - impostorvision (float) - killcooldown (float) - killdistance (short/medium/long/custom) - taskbarupdates (always/meetings/never) - visualtasks (on/off) - commontasks (number) - longtasks (number) - shorttasks (number) - scientistcount (number) - scientistchance (number) - vitalsdisplaycooldown (float) - batteryduration (float) - engineercount (number) - engineerchance (number) - ventusecooldown (float) - maxtimeinvents (float) - guardianangelcount (number) - guardianangelchance (number) - protectcooldown (float) - protectduration (float) - protectvisibletoimpostors (on/off) - shapeshiftercount (number) - shapeshifterchance (number) - shapeshiftduration (float) - shapeshiftcooldown (float) - leaveshapeshiftevidence (on/off) - phantomcount (number) - phantomchance (number) - inviscooldown (float) - invisduration (float) - noisemakercount (number) - noisemakerchance (number) - noisemakerimpostoralert (on/off) - noisemakeralertduration (number) - trackercount (number) - trackerchance (number) - trackduration (float) - trackcooldown (float) - trackdelay (float) - ghostdotasks (on/off) Notes: 1. Upper and lowercase matters 2. Where it says custom, you obviously put a number argument after it 3. A float is a single precision floating number, like 1.7 4. "ghostdotasks" causes issues if you set it 5. Example uses: - "/cs map polus" - "/cs killdistance custom 4" - "/cs trackdelay 1,7" - "/cs confirmejects on"

LoadingHint.0:
Did you know?
You can put roles of your choice into custom teams!
View instructions on our website (link on main menu)!
LoadingHint.1:
Did you know?
You can force or ban certain role and add-on combos using /combo in lobby!
Give it a try after this game!
LoadingHint.2:
Did you know?
You can change roles', add-ons', settings', etc. names using custom translation files!
LoadingHint.3:
Did you know?
You can play our beta releases/test versions!
Join our Discord server to download them (link on main menu)!
LoadingHint.4:
Found a bug?
Report it to our Discord server (link on main menu)!
We'll fix it as soon as possible!
LoadingHint.5:
Have an idea you would like to see in the mod?
Post your suggestion in our Discord server (link on main menu)!
We'll consider it for future updates!
LoadingHint.6:
Did you know?
You can activate the ban-list to permanently ban players using their friend code!
LoadingHint.7:
Did you know?
You can add/remove moderators directly in the game by using /addmod and /deletemod!
LoadingHint.8: Tahukah kamu?\nPeretas biasanya tidak mempunyai friend code, jadi kamu bisa dengan mudah mengaktifkan fitur proteksi di Pengaturan Sistem!
LoadingHint.9:
Did you know?
You can quickly change game settings without opening the menu using /changesetting (/cs)!
Example: /cs map polus
LoadingHint.10:
Did you know?
You can customize your lobby tag using custom translation files!
LoadingHint.11:
Did you know?
You can set your role/add-on for the next game using /setrole and /setaddon as the host!
LoadingHint.12:
Confused about your death? Don't know who killed you?
Use /death or /d after you die!
LoadingHint.13:
Did you know?
You can use /poll to ask your players a question and let them vote!
LoadingHint.14:
Bored of waiting in lobby or after dying early?
Use /gno to play a simple Guess The Number minigame to speed up time!
LoadingHint.15:
Black screened after a meeting?
Try pressing CTRL + SHIFT + X to fix it!
LoadingHint.16:
Don't know what your role or add-on does?
Press F1 instead of typing commands!
LoadingHint.17:
Did you know?
You can quickly enable/disable roles by typing /os {percentage} {role}!
(This will set the spawn chance of the role to the specified percentage)
LoadingHint.18:
Edited the translation file but don't want to restart the game just to apply the changes?
Press F5 + T!
LoadingHint.19:
Chat icon not appearing?
Press SHIFT + C + ENTER to fix it!
LoadingHint.20:
Did you know?
You can instantly start the game without waiting for the 5 seconds countdown by pressing SHIFT!
LoadingHint.21:
Did you know?
You can cancel the starting countdown using the Cancel button or by pressing C!
LoadingHint.22:
Did you know?
You can reset all settings to their default values by pressing CTRL + SHIFT + DELETE!
LoadingHint.23:
Did you know?
You can make yourself suicide by pressing SHIFT + E + ENTER!
LoadingHint.24:
Did you know?
Not even the most experienced EHR hosts know all of these facts about the mod they're getting told in these tips!
LoadingHint.25:
Meeting not ending when everyone voted?
Press F6 to end the meeting while also counting the votes!
LoadingHint.26:
Do you have a friend who thinks they understand everything, and you want to prove them wrong?
Turn on the Chemist role and see their reaction!
LoadingHint.27:
Peran favorit si pengembang adalah:
Echo, Penguin, Rift Maker, Bubble, Evolver, Rogue, Vengeance....
dan bisa dibilang semua peran Crewmate :D
LoadingHint.28:
Did you know?
EHR has 16 different game modes! Try them out!
Switch game modes using the buttons under the huge title in the top left of the settings menu!
LoadingHint.29:
Did you know?
EHR has a unique game mode for expert gamers called Stop And Go!
Give it a try after this game!
LoadingHint.30:
Getting Crewmate over and over again? Didn't get to kill for the last half an hour?
Unleash your bloodthirst in our Free For All game mode!
LoadingHint.31:
Did you know?
EHR has a custom Hide And Seek game mode with 12 special roles dedicated for this playstyle!
LoadingHint.32:
Are you a master in Bomb Tag and Hot Potato?
Show it to your friends and test your skills in our Hot Potato game mode!
LoadingHint.33:
Are you the fastest tasker and killer in the lobby?
Then we have a special game mode made for you! Try the Speedrun game mode after this game!
LoadingHint.34:
Do you like the Demon role and its mechanics?
What if we told you, that there's a game mode where everyone is a Demon, called Solo PVP?
Give it a try after this game!
LoadingHint.35:
Did you know?
CTRL + F1 allows you to dump the game's logs at anytime!
LoadingHint.36:
Did you know?
You can use pets to trigger abilites!
Just turn on the setting in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.37:
Did you know?
You can make everyone be able to vent!
Just turn on the setting in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.38:
Did you know?
You can disable specific tasks in Game Modifiers!
LoadingHint.39:
Did you know?
You can change the zipline travel duration on The Fungle in Mod Settings!
LoadingHint.40:
Did you know?
I bet you didn't
LoadingHint.41:
Did you know?
'at least' is 2 words, not 1
LoadingHint.43: Did you know that you can't know everything?
LoadingHint.44:
Did you know?
The Dev's favorite number is 44
LoadingHint.45:
Did you know that you can use the yield statement in an iterator to provide the next value or signal the end of an iteration in a loop since async doesn't work in BepInEx?
Yeah, me neither

SkeldChance: Chance that the map is <color=#66a186>The Skeld</color>
MiraChance: Chance that the map is <color=#e84b56>MIRA HQ</color>
